name: call_user_func_array
purpose: Call a user function given with an array of parameters

return.description: Returns the function result, or FALSE on error.

notes.description:
Referenced variables in param_arr are passed to the
    function by a reference, others are passed by a value. In other words, it
    does not depend on the function signature whether the parameter is passed
    by a value or by a reference.

Callbacks registered
with functions such as call_user_func and call_user_func_array will not be
called if there is an uncaught exception thrown in a previous callback.
